mapper.sql: contract_num, contract_id, emp_id, contract_startDate, contract_endDate, contract_status, contract_belong_company, contract_delectStatus, oa_rlzyb_contract.create_time
mapper.select: SELECT contract_num, oa_rlzyb_contract.emp_id AS emp_id,emp_name, emp_department,depart_name, emp_position AS position_id,position_name, contract_id,contract_status,contract_belong_company,contract_startDate,contract_endDate,contract_delectStatus,oa_rlzyb_contract.create_time FROM oa_rlzyb_contract INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_employee ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id = oa_rlzyb_contract.emp_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_department ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_department = oa_rlzyb_department.depart_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_position ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position = oa_rlzyb_position.position_id

SELECT oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id AS emp_id, emp_name, emp_position, position_name, emp_department, depart_name, contract_startDate, contract_endDate, oa_rlzyb_contract.create_time FROM oa_rlzyb_contract INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_employee ON oa_rlzyb_contract.emp_id = oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_position ON oa_rlzyb_employee.emp_position = oa_rlzyb_position.position_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_department ON oa_rlzyb_department.emp_department = oa_rlzyb_employee.depart_id
oa_rlzyb_contract.emp_id = #{emp_id}
mapper.update: update oa_rlzyb_contract set contract_id = #{contract_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_id = #{emp_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_startDate = #{contract_startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, contract_endDate = #{contract_endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, contract_status = #{contract_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_belong_company = #{contract_belong_company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_delectStatus = #{contract_delectStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where contract_num = #{contract_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}
